# utf16ExternalPlainText

**Type Property**

A type that represents plain text encoded as UTF-16 with an optional bill of materials.

## Declaration

```swift
static var utf16ExternalPlainText: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

If the bill of materials isn’t present, the encoding uses “external byte order (big-endian),

The identifier for this type is `public.utf16-external-plain-text`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypePlainText].

## Text files

- **text**: A base type that represents all text-encoded data, including text with markup.
- **plainText**: A type that represents text with no markup and an unspecified encoding.
- **utf8PlainText**: A type that represents plain text encoded as UTF-8.
- **utf16PlainText**: A type that represents plain text encoded as UTF-16 in native byte order with an optional bill of materials.
